700548f-a.title: Bronx: Boston Road - Allerton Avenue
700548f-a.text:
Boston Road, north from Allerton Ave. On the east side of the
thoroughfare is the extensive Lorillard Spencer Estate.
1917.
MAY BE REPRODUCED.
NWg. ~ 1ieo9

701437f-a.title: Bronx: Matthews Avenue - Boston Road
701437f-a.text:
Matthews Avenue, at the S.E. corner of Boston Road.
April 3, 1938.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
